page.title: 11Old Chapel
page.content:
On 28 February 1784 a chapel was built in Key Lane and the original Deeds are complete with seals and signatures in the possession of Mrs Meadowcroft whose family bought the chapel.
The chapel was not used after 1902 for services as there was a new one built on Church Hill. Whenthe Meadowcroft family took over the chapel in 1960 it still contained some pews and the balcony.When these were removed to make a workshop a large bible was found dated 1781 hidden under balcony floorboards. This is in the possession of Mrs Meadowcroft and was printed by York firm. The chapel was used as a garage for a traction engine until 1971 when Mr Meadowcroft died. It is no longer in use but still belongs to Mrs Meadowcroft.
